articles.title: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi lands in Taiwan amid threats of Chinese retaliation
articles.description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi landed in Taipei on Tuesday, marking a significant show of support for Taiwan despite China's threats of retaliation over the visit.
articles.content:

articles.author: Hannah Rabinowitz, CNN
articles.title: Biden Justice Department sues Idaho over state's abortion restrictions
articles.description: The Biden administration filed a lawsuit on Tuesday against Idaho for restricting access to abortion to patients who need lifesaving medical treatment, the first such Justice Department challenge since the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade this summer.

articles.author: Zach Williams
articles.title: Hochul has big lead over Zeldin, but gov survey tight in suburbs, upstate
articles.description: “Hochul dominates in New York City, leading by nearly 50 points, while Zeldin has slim 3-point leads both upstate and in the downstate suburbs,” pollster Steven Greenberg said.
articles.content:
A new Siena College poll shows Democratic Gov. Kathy Hochul with a 14-point lead over Republican nominee Rep. Lee Zeldin ahead of the Nov. 8 election.

articles.author: John Wagner, Eugene Scott, Yvonne Wingett Sanchez, Patrick Marley
articles.title: Primaries live updates: Primaries in Mich., Mo., and Ariz. present a fresh test of Trump’s influence
articles.description: Voters in Arizona, Missouri, Michigan, Kansas and Washington head to the polls to choose candidates for November. A Kansas referendum will be the first vote since the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade.
articles.content:
Early Tuesday, someone stole about 15 pens one from each voting booth at one polling location, Maricopa County Recorder Stephen Richer told The Washington Post.

articles.author: Rob Jennings | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: Remains of Revolutionary War soldiers killed in 1777 found in N.J. field
articles.description: The remarkable find — which also uncovered a rare King George III gold guinea and other artifacts — adds a new chapter to New Jersey’s Revolutionary War history.
articles.content: The remarkable find — which also uncovered a rare King George III gold guinea and other artifacts — adds a new chapter to New Jersey’s Revolutionary War history.

articles.author: Dakin Andone and Kevin Conlon, CNN
articles.title: 'My life will never, ever be the same.' Court hears first victim impact statements in Parkland shooter's death penalty trial
articles.description: Families of the 17 people killed in the Parkland school shooting continue to take the stand Tuesday, offering victim impact statements to illustrate the toll the murders have taken as a jury decides whether to sentence the shooter to death.

articles.title: Evacuated McKinney Fire kittens go viral in adorable Facebook post
